text: haey nowpel del puokke bankheunh vea( tearounakamm)dauch cheadom popk da thom tamrong towkean chrolongophnom robsa puokke puokke bercha noam knea niyeay tha nih kuchea dom popk del noam tukaphlieng mk aoy puok yeung . phtoytowvinh vea kuchea tearounakamm del puok anak ban som aoy kaetlaeng phleam noh . vea kuchea khyal del phtok daoy tearounakamm da chhucheab bamphot
